tos_list: Payment: 50% upfront, 50% after the work is completed.
Revisions: Up to 3 minor revisions are included. Major changes may incur additional fees.
Refunds: Full refunds are only possible before the work begins. After starting, partial refunds may be considered depending on the progress.

Updates: A document will be provided explaining what needs to be done for each update.

en.about_p1: Hello! My name is Ganert and I'm a programmer who is also trying to become a digital artist.
en.about_p2: I'm learning to create digital art and I'm excited to share my progress with you. My goal is to create vibrant characters and engaging stories through digital art.
about_setup_content: PSU: Cooler Master MWE Gold v2 1050W

Headset: Havit Fuxi H3 / Redragon Zeus X
about_schedule_list: Mondays and Tuesdays: from 4 PM some commissions until 6 PM and we return at 8:30 PM until 10 PM with games
Wednesdays: We start at 8 AM until 3 PM and return at 8:30 PM with some games
Thursdays: From 12:30 PM until 3 PM and we return at 8:30 PM with a movie
Fridays: From 8:30 PM only with games
Saturdays and Sundays: Starts from 9 AM with some games and commissions until 11 PM ending with a movie
en.contact_text: You can find me on the following platforms:
guide_steps_webcam_desktop: Step 1: Open your OBS, find the sources tab, and click on +.
Step 2: Select the Media Source option.
Step 3: Uncheck the Local File option, reduce Network Buffering to 0, add the IP Address that appears at the bottom of the mobile app in the Input field, and click OK.
Step 4: Open the Webcam Desktop application and type in the IP address from your mobile app.
Step 5: Your camera will now be working correctly.
en.age_gate_text: The content you are trying to access is intended for audiences 18 and over only. Do you confirm you are of age to proceed?
